mapper.sql: id, task_id, student_id, create_user_id, screening_org_id, school_id, plan_id, district_id, vision_data,computer_optometry, biometric_data, other_eye_diseases, is_double_screen, update_time, create_time, ocular_inspection_data, eye_pressure_data, fundus_data, slit_lamp_data, pupil_optometry_data, visual_loss_level_data, systemic_disease_symptom
mapper.select: select count(1) as count, student_id from m_vision_screening_result where is_double_screen = 0 group by student_id

select
from m_vision_screening_result where student_id = #{studentId} and is_double_screen = 0 order by create_time desc limit 1
SELECT DISTINCT plan_id FROM m_vision_screening_result WHERE DATE(update_time) BETWEEN DATE(#{startTime}) AND DATE(#{endTime})

select
from m_vision_screening_result where student_id = #{studentId} group by update_time order by update_time desc

select mvsr.* from m_vision_screening_result mvsr left join m_stat_conclusion msc on mvsr.id = msc.result_id where msc.is_valid = 1 and mvsr.is_double_screen = 0 and mvsr.is_notice = false and mvsr.update_time <= CURDATE()

select
from m_vision_screening_result where screening_plan_school_student_id = #{planStudentId} and is_double_screen = 0

select v.school_id as id,s.`name` as name from m_vision_screening_result as v LEFT JOIN m_school AS s on s.id=v.school_id where v.plan_id = #{planId} and screening_org_id = #{orgId} GROUP BY v.school_id

SELECT mspss.grade_id as id,msg.`name` as name FROM m_vision_screening_result mvsr LEFT JOIN m_screening_plan_school_student mspss ON mspss.id = mvsr.screening_plan_school_student_id LEFT JOIN m_school_grade msg ON mspss.grade_id = msg.id WHERE mvsr.plan_id = #{planId} and mvsr.screening_org_id = #{orgId} and mspss.school_id = #{schoolId} GROUP BY mspss.grade_id

SELECT mspss.class_id as id,msc.`name` as name FROM m_vision_screening_result mvsr LEFT JOIN m_screening_plan_school_student mspss ON mspss.id = mvsr.screening_plan_school_student_id LEFT JOIN m_school_class msc ON mspss.class_id = msc.id WHERE mvsr.plan_id = #{planId} and mvsr.screening_org_id = #{orgId} and mspss.school_id = #{schoolId} and mspss.grade_id = #{gradeId} GROUP BY mspss.class_id
